posts.title: Albion Online - Wandering In The World Of Albion
Porn Exploration - The New Drug
posts.excerpt: Exploring how design thinking and storytelling can turn a simple project into something that moves people.
posts.content: This post dives into the synergy between art and logic — how the act of coding can be as expressive as painting, and how design thinking shapes meaningful user experiences.

posts.title: The Myth of Sisyphus & The Creator’s Loop
posts.excerpt: An introspective dive into the myth of Sisyphus — and how it mirrors the life of a modern creator constantly pushing the boulder uphill.
posts.content: Drawing parallels between Sisyphus and modern creative struggles, this essay explores the idea of embracing the endless cycle of effort, passion, and self-discovery.
